mapper.select: SELECT b.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID gnqStdItemId, b.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME gnqStdItemName, a.GNQ_OK_VAL okVal, a.GNQ_NG_VAL ngVal FROM pd_gnq_std a INNER JOIN pd_gnq_std_item b ON a.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID = b.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID AND a.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} AND b.PARENT_ID= #{filterMap.parentId}
SELECT b.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID gnqStdClaId, b.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME gnqStdClaName FROM pd_gnq_std_item b WHERE b.LEVEL_ID = #{filterMap.levelId}
SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM pd_standard AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
